text.value: Adaptivity of content for different screens

blocks.title: Online business card
blocks.text: Small site, usually consisting of one or several web pages and basic information about the organization, individual, company, goods or services, price lists, contact information.

blocks.title: Corporate website
blocks.text: Contains full information about the company, services, products, events in the life of the company, often contains various functional tools for working with content (search and filters, news, galleries, corporate blogs).

blocks.title: Promo website
blocks.text: Should serve as an advertising booklet and attract the attention of customers. It"s a small site, usually single page, containig data about the company, the direction of activity, contact information, shares, news.

blocks.title: Blog
blocks.text: Main content - regularly added records containing text, images or multimedia with the ability to publish reviews (comments) by visitors.

blocks.title: Gallery website
blocks.text: Provides the ability to view various multimedia and text content (lists, blocks, sliders, usually - with links to detailed versions).

blocks.title: Internet shop
blocks.text: The goal is to trade through the Internet. Allows users to view the range of products and services of the company with images, prices, information about the technical characteristics, use different convenient filters, create an order for purchase, choose methods of payment and delivery of the order, pay for the order.

title: What do the client thinks over before ordering?

blocks.title: Why do I need the website?
What exactly do I want to post?
What kind of pages do I need?
Do I need feedback from clients?
In what color (colors) do I need the website?
Where do I plan to host the website?
